title: The Elephant Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Specialty is crepes, plus offers a selection of teas (many organic) that are brewed table side. Ask for vegan crepes and the staff will guide you through the options. Try the roasted sweet pepper & fresh spinach crepe made using chickpea flour, non-dairy milk, no eggs. Zen-like interior, has Wi-Fi.
